summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Belvidere Avenue from Thirty-eight Avenue Southwest to West Lander Street, et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading to under Ordinance No. 26925, creating Local Improvement District No. 2483, prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
